name: Should You Pick Up The Phone?
name_original: Should You Pick Up The Phone?
description:
An anxiety from picking up the phone simulator.

Game about how I used to feel whenever the phone rang in my old house.

Controls: Move mouse left to right or right to left to disperse the thought clouds.

Music track is To run in an elevator in a dream in a fiction in space by Monplaisir.

SFX by colinbf423 and cvp1965 from freesound.org.

Graphics powered by The Noun Project. Graphics used were:

- Phone by Alex Auda Samora
- Table by Mister Pixel
- Cloud by Fabian Kloepfer
- Mouse by By Arthur Shlain, IL
- Reload by sofi, ID

Notes: If fonts don't show up, reload the page.
